title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with President Emmanuel Macron of France – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
November 18, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today with President Emmanuel Macron of France about the situation in Lebanon and Syria.  Both presidents agreed on the need to work with allies to counter Hizballah’s and Iran’s destabilizing activities in the region.
